definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bind around, upon (cf. Ar. 9anada turn aside fr. way; Syr. 9nad defecit, defuit; cf. also [[עִמָּדִי]] (for [[עִמִּי]]));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 1 s. [[לִי אֶעֶנְרֶנּוּ]] Job 31:36 (obj. garland, in fig.); Imv. sf. [[עָנְדֵם]] Pr 6:21 (fig.; ‖[[קָשַׁר]]).
